snippet: The No. 11 Irish went on a 26-3 tear to put away No. 19 North Carolina in the conference championship game.
abstract: Men's College Basketball Roundup; Notre Dame defeats North Carolina, 90-82, in Atlantic Coast Conference title game; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The No. 11 Irish went on a 26-3 tear to put away No. 19 North Carolina in the conference championship game.

headline.print_headline: Irish Snatch the A.C.C. Title With a Second-Half Surge
headline.main: Notre Dame Snatches the A.C.C. Title With a Second-Half Surge
